content:
Here's the text form : "Your focus is getting terrible.

And I bet you'll be tempted to skip this 20 seconds ad.

But you'll make through it, because I believe in you.

This strange egg use a little known technology to get your brain to fight through the hardest challenges in life.

Place it in your hand. 

Left hand to kill your anxiety, insomnia and depression,

Right hand to get more energised and more focused.

Twist the cap and hold it for 15 minutes.

Voilà. 

Click the button if you want to get one or to know more about this product." Tell me what should I improve and what should I replace.
